title: Technology!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Thanks for waiting, Shioriko-chan~! Sorry, the train got delayed....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Don’t worry about it. I was reading, so it went by in an instant.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Reading?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, I downloaded it on my tablet.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Tablet? Downloaded?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Umm.... This thing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I-, it’s the future zura—!! How do you read from it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You turn the pages like this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Technology zura....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You can carry as many books as you want, so it’s quite convenient.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru wants one too—!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
